パッケージ com.github.guitarScale.fingerboardStracture

クラス Fingerboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.guitarScale.fingerboardStracture.Fingerboard
  • public class Fingerboard
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a guitar fingerboard.

    • コンストラクタの概要

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタ 説明
      Fingerboard​(int numberOfFret, KeyBase keyBase, Scale scaleX, Tuning tuning)
      Constructs a FingerBoard with the specified number of frets, key base, scale name, and tuning.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • Fingerboard

        public Fingerboard​(int numberOfFret,
                   KeyBase keyBase,
                   Scale scaleX,
                   Tuning tuning)
        Constructs a FingerBoard with the specified number of frets, key base, scale name, and tuning.
        パラメータ:
        numberOfFret - the number of frets on the fingerboard
        keyBase - the key base of the scale
        scaleX - the name of the scale
        tuning - the tuning of the guitar
        例外:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the number of frets is less than 12 or greater than 32

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getStructure

        public int[][] getStructure()
        Returns the structure of the fingerboard.
        戻り値:
        a 2D array representing the structure of the fingerboard

      • getScale

        public Scale getScale()
        Returns the scale of the FingerBoard.
        戻り値:
        the scale of the FingerBoard

      • getTuning

        public Tuning getTuning()
        Returns the tuning of the FingerBoard.
        戻り値:
        the tuning of the FingerBoard

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the fingerboard.
        オーバーライド:
        toString クラス内 java.lang.Object
        戻り値:
        a string representation of the fingerboard

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
        Checks if this FingerBoard is equal to the specified object.

        The result is true if and only if the argument is not null and is a FingerBoard object that has the same fretboard structure as this object.

        オーバーライド:
        equals クラス内 java.lang.Object
        パラメータ:
        obj - the object to compare this FingerBoard against
        戻り値:
        true if the given object represents a FingerBoard equivalent to this FingerBoard, false otherwise

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Returns a hash code value for this FingerBoard.

        This method is supported for the benefit of hash tables such as those provided by HashMap. The hash code is computed based on the fretboard structure of this FingerBoard.

        オーバーライド:
        hashCode クラス内 java.lang.Object
        戻り値:
        a hash code value for this object
